channel.title: Help
channel.description: how do i make it so when u get a prize from a quest if u click on the quest sign thing on quest list u keep on getting it how do i make it so u get one and also how do i make it so u have to have all quests done to wear quest cape.

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

When you finish a quest make it set a variable to true (if itâ€™s a boolean) so that when you click the button, it checks if the variable is true, then carries on an action.

Under the wear() method, add this:

if(wearID == CAPEID && !capeVar) sendMessage("You need to finish a quest in order to wear this cape.");

Read full topic
